setting.location: Small modest room in middle-class boarding house, simply furnished but clean and orderly
setting.weather: Gray morning light filtering through single window

characters.appearance: Young woman, mid-20s, gentle face with kind eyes, brown hair in simple bun, slender but strong build
characters.clothing: Plain dark blue dress suitable for work, white collar and cuffs, small silver brooch, practical leather shoes
characters.position: Seated at small wooden table near window, morning light illuminating her face
characters.action: Carefully mending delicate lace with needle and thread, working with skilled precise movements

scene.mainElements: Modest furnished room with single bed covered in white bedding, small wooden table and chair, simple wardrobe, washbasin on wooden stand
scene.details: Sewing materials scattered on table - spools of thread, small scissors, pieces of fine lace in various stages of repair, small oil lamp for evening work, few personal items including prayer book and pressed flowers, single window with simple curtains providing natural light, wooden floor with small rag rug
scene.background: Plain whitewashed walls with small religious icon, clothes hanging on wooden pegs, view through window of other modest buildings
scene.atmosphere: Quiet dignity in simplicity, sense of honest work and moral virtue, contrast between modest circumstances and inner richness, morning peace before day's labor begins, no text or letters visible

composition.cameraAngle: Medium shot showing the woman at work in her simple environment
composition.focus: Her hands working delicately with the lace, representing skill and virtue
composition.depth: Foreground: detailed lacework, middle: woman's concentrated expression, background: modest room appointments
